column4: your best bet(especially for audio) is to install 10.10... 9.10 was a train wreck because that was when pulse audio was implemented, and the intelHDA chipsets caused lots of probs
why don't you just clean install 10.10?
well, i liked WIndows 95 to, but when it's useful life expired, i knew i had to move on
Also, I didn't  enjoy 10.10 because I ha dthe same sound problems as I am having now, exxept there was no sound what so ever
brb then, I guess I am going to install 10.10 =(
I type "lspci" into the terminal, correct?
that will tell you what you want to know, yes.
Audio device: ATI Technologies Inc Device 970f
Audio device: ATI Technologies Inc Device 970f
